question: Will the Texans win Super Bowl 2025?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Houston Texans win Super Bowl LIX. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If at any point it becomes impossible for this team to win the Super Bowl based on the rules of the NFL (e.g. they are eliminated in the playoff bracket), this market will resolve immediately to "No".

events.title: Super Bowl Champion 2025
events.description: This is a market on predicting the winner of the Super Bowl in 2025.

question: Will Nikki Hiltz (USA) win gold in 1500m W?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Nikki Hiltz (USA) wins a Gold medal in Women’s 1500m at the 2024 Summer Olympics. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

If this athlete is eliminated from contention for a Gold medal in this event based on the official rules of the Olympics, this market will resolve to “No.” In case of a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the tied athlete representing USA. If no tied athlete represents USA, or if both tied athletes represent USA, this market will resolve in favor of the athlete whose last name comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the first official results published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

question: Tim Walz replaced as Democratic VP nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tim Walz officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from his candidacy for Vice President in the 2024 US election by 11:59 PM ET on November 4, 2024.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Tim Walz from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If Tim Walz does not announce his withdrawal or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race by the specified time, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Tim Walz or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Kamala Harris replaced as nominee at DNC?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris is confirmed to have been replaced or withdraws as the nominee of the Democratic Party at the Democratic National Convention (DNC). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

If Harris is confirmed to have been replaced or withdraws as the nominee before the DNC this market will also resolve to "Yes."

If the DNC has concluded and Kamala Harris remains the nominee, this market will resolve to "No." If the DNC is cancelled or rescheduled to a date after November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the Democratic Party and footage from the DNC, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Kamala Harris replaced as nominee at DNC?
events.description:

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the Democratic Party and footage from the DNC, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: 51kg M Boxing Final: Bennama (FRA) vs. Dusmatov (UZB)
description:
This is a market on whether Billal Bennama (FRA) or Hasanboy Dusmatov (UZB) will win their Final match in the Men's 51kg (flyweight) category scheduled for Saturday, August 8, 2024.

If Billal Bennama (FRA) is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Bennama”. If Hasanboy Dusmatov (UZB) is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Dusmatov”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after August 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: GOP wins popular vote by 7% or more?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes” if the Republican Party wins the popular vote in the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election by 7% or more of the popular vote when compared with the second place party. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of resolving this market, the 'margin of victory' is defined as the absolute difference between the percentages of votes received by the Republican Party and the second-place party. Percentages of the votes received by each party will be determined by dividing the total number of votes each of the two parties receives by the sum of all votes cast in the election.

This market will resolve based off the official vote count once all States and D.C. have certified their votes.

events.title: Popular Vote Margin of Victory?
events.description: Popular Vote Margin of Victory in Presidential Election?

description:

question: WA-03 election: Glusenkamp Perez (D) vs. Kent (R)
description:
United States general elections are scheduled to take place on November 5, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Perez" if Democrat Marie Gluesenkamp Perez wins the congressional election in Washington's 3rd district. 

This market will resolve to "Kent" if Republican John Kent wins the congressional election in Washington's 3rd district. 

If any other candidate wins the election, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Did Trump launch $RTR?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump announces involvement in the launch of Restore the Republic (RTR) coin (https://dexscreener.com/solana/7G5DM7Jy7TMWKgH313tA3vF6AqHpbHP4TWZzpTVLWv9c) by August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

This market will resolve solely based on announcements by Donald Trump. Media reporting of statements from Trump will also count. Media statements from acquaintances of Donald Trump will NOT count - there must be posts and/or statements from Trump by the resolution date for this market to resolve to "Yes".

question: EDL declared terrorist org in August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the English Defense League (EDL) is declared a proscribed terrorist organization by the government of the United Kingdom between August 8 and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Carles Puigdemont arrested in August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Catalan separatist Carles Puigdemont is arrested between August 7 and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government involved in any action against Carles Puigdemont and information from Carles and/or his legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will the Falcons win the NFC South?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Atlanta Falcons win the NFC South in the 2024-2025 NFL Season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If at any point it becomes impossible for the Atlanta Falcons team to win the NFC South based on the rules of the NFL (e.g., they are mathematically eliminated from finishing first in the division), this market will resolve immediately to “No”.

question: Olympic Basketball: USA (-14.5) vs. Serbia Spread
description:
This market refers to the Olympics Men’s Basketball Seminal matchup between the United States and Serbia scheduled for August 8th, 2024.

This market will resolve to “USA” if Team USA wins their semifinal matchup against Serbia by 15 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to “Serbia.”

If this game is postponed after August 13th, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the IOC, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Olympic Basketball: USA (-14.5) vs. Serbia Spread

question: No Trump vs. Harris debates before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump and Kamala Harris engage in 0 live, publicly-broadcast debates between August 7 and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Both in-person debates and virtual debates will count toward a "Yes" resolution for this market.

The resolution source for this market will be footage of such a debate, however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

events.title: # of debates between Trump and Harris?
events.description: This is a market group on the number of debates that take place between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris before November 5, 2024.

question: Martin Small announced as next BlackRock CEO?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Martin Small is officially announced as the successor to Larry Fink as CEO of BlackRock by December 31, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If someone else is announced as the successor to Larry Fink as CEO of BlackRock this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of a successor will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether the announced replacement actually becomes the next CEO of BlackRock. 

The resolution source will be public statements from BlackRock or Larry Fink.

events.title: Who will replace Larry Fink as BlackRock CEO?
events.description: Who will replace Larry Fink as BlackRock CEO?
